alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hancock (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hancock and southeastern Greene Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Shoulderbone, or 7 miles northwest of Sparta, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Sparta, White Plains, Liberty, Shoulderbone and Devereux. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
